üß† ADHD Gig Tracker

Simple earnings tracking for neurodivergent minds

üî• Today's Progress
$0.00

0
Tasks
0üî•
Streak
Goal: $ 50.00
0%
$0.00
Ready to start earning! üöÄ
üíº Select Platform
‚ö° Quick Add
üí∞ Custom Amount
üìú Today's Earnings
Start adding earnings to see your progress! üéØ
+ totalEarnings.toFixed(2); elements.todayTasks.textContent = taskCount; elements.streakDisplay.textContent = streak + 'üî•'; elements.goalAmount.textContent = dailyGoal.toFixed(2); // Update progress const progress = Math.min((totalEarnings / dailyGoal) * 100, 100); elements.progressFill.style.width = progress + '%'; elements.progressPercent.textContent = Math.round(progress) + '%'; // Update goal status if (totalEarnings >= dailyGoal) { elements.totalBox.classList.add('complete'); elements.progressFill.classList.add('complete'); elements.totalInfo.textContent = 'üèÜ GOAL CRUSHED! Amazing work!'; } else { elements.totalBox.classList.remove('complete'); elements.progressFill.classList.remove('complete'); const remaining = dailyGoal - totalEarnings; elements.totalInfo.textContent = ' // Update history display function updateHistory() { if (history.length === 0) { elements.historyList.innerHTML = '
Start adding earnings to see your progress! üéØ
'; return; } elements.historyList.innerHTML = history.map(entry => '
' + '
' + '
' + entry.platform + '
' + '
' + entry.time + '
' + '
' + '
+$' + entry.amount.toFixed(2) + '
' + '
' ).join(''); } // Add earning function addEarning(amount, platform) { totalEarnings += amount; taskCount++; // Add to history const now = new Date(); history.unshift({ amount: amount, platform: platform, time: now.toLocaleTimeString(), timestamp: now }); // Keep only last 20 entries if (history.length > 20) { history = history.slice(0, 20); } // Check milestones checkMilestones(); // Update UI updateUI(); // Show success showNotification('+$' + amount.toFixed(2) + ' from ' + platform + '! üí∞'); } // Check for milestones function checkMilestones() { const milestones = [5, 10, 25, 50, 100]; const currentMilestone = milestones.find(m => totalEarnings >= m && totalEarnings - history[0].amount < m); if (currentMilestone) { setTimeout(() => { showNotification('üéâ $' + currentMilestone + ' milestone reached! üéâ', 'milestone'); }, 500); } // Goal reached if (totalEarnings >= dailyGoal && totalEarnings - history[0].amount < dailyGoal) { setTimeout(() => { showNotification('üèÜ DAILY GOAL SMASHED! You are incredible! üèÜ', 'milestone'); }, 1000); } } // Select platform function selectPlatform(platform, amounts) { currentPlatform = platform; // Update quick buttons elements.quickGrid.innerHTML = amounts.map(amount => '' ).join(''); showNotification(platform + ' selected! Tap amounts below üéØ', 'milestone'); // Reset after 30 seconds setTimeout(() => { elements.quickGrid.innerHTML = '' + '' + '' + ''; }, 30000); } // Manual amount validation elements.manualInput.addEventListener('input', function() { const value = parseFloat(this.value); elements.manualBtn.disabled = !value || value <= 0; }); elements.manualInput.addEventListener('keypress', function(e) { if (e.key === 'Enter' && !elements.manualBtn.disabled) { addManualAmount(); } }); // Add manual amount function addManualAmount() { const amount = parseFloat(elements.manualInput.value); if (amount && amount > 0) { addEarning(amount, currentPlatform || 'Manual Entry'); elements.manualInput.value = ''; elements.manualBtn.disabled = true; } } // Goal editing function editGoal() { elements.goalArea.classList.add('hidden'); elements.goalInput.classList.remove('hidden'); elements.goalInput.value = dailyGoal.toFixed(2); elements.goalInput.focus(); elements.goalInput.select(); } elements.goalInput.addEventListener('blur', saveGoal); elements.goalInput.addEventListener('keypress', function(e) { if (e.key === 'Enter') saveGoal(); }); function saveGoal() { const newGoal = parseFloat(elements.goalInput.value); if (newGoal && newGoal > 0) { dailyGoal = newGoal; updateUI(); showNotification('Goal updated to $' + dailyGoal.toFixed(2) + '! üéØ'); } elements.goalInput.classList.add('hidden'); elements.goalArea.classList.remove('hidden'); } // Undo last function undoLast() { if (history.length > 0) { const last = history.shift(); totalEarnings -= last.amount; taskCount = Math.max(0, taskCount - 1); updateUI(); showNotification('Undid $' + last.amount.toFixed(2) + ' from ' + last.platform, 'error'); } } // Clear history function clearHistory() { if (confirm('Clear all earnings for today? This cannot be undone.')) { history = []; updateUI(); showNotification('History cleared! üßπ'); } } // Reset all function resetAll() { if (confirm('Reset everything? This will clear all earnings and reset your goal.')) { totalEarnings = 0; taskCount = 0; history = []; dailyGoal = 50; currentPlatform = ''; updateUI(); showNotification('Everything reset! Fresh start! üåÖ', 'milestone'); } } // Export data function exportData() { const today = new Date().toLocaleDateString(); const avgPerTask = taskCount > 0 ? (totalEarnings / taskCount).toFixed(2) : '0.00'; const textData = 'üß† ADHD Gig Tracker Report - ' + today + '\n\n' + 'üí∞ SUMMARY:\n' + '‚Ä¢ Total Earned: $' + totalEarnings.toFixed(2) + '\n' + '‚Ä¢ Daily Goal: $' + dailyGoal.toFixed(2) + ' (' + Math.round((totalEarnings / dailyGoal) * 100) + '% complete)\n' + '‚Ä¢ Tasks Completed: ' + taskCount + '\n' + '‚Ä¢ Average per Task: $' + avgPerTask + '\n\n' + 'üìú EARNINGS HISTORY:\n' + (history.length > 0 ? history.map(entry => '‚Ä¢ ' + entry.time + ' - ' + entry.platform + ': $' + entry.amount.toFixed(2)).join('\n') : '‚Ä¢ No earnings recorded yet' ) + '\n\n' + '---\nGenerated by ADHD Gig Tracker üéØ'; // Copy to clipboard navigator.clipboard.writeText(textData).then(() => { showNotification('Data copied to clipboard! üìã Paste anywhere!', 'milestone'); }).catch(() => { // Fallback for older browsers const textArea = document.createElement('textarea'); textArea.value = textData; document.body.appendChild(textArea); textArea.select(); document.execCommand('copy'); document.body.removeChild(textArea); showNotification('Data copied to clipboard! üìã', 'milestone'); }); } // Initialize app function init() { updateUI(); showNotification('Welcome back! Ready to earn some money? üöÄ', 'milestone'); } // Start the app if (document.readyState === 'loading') { document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', init); } else { init(); } + remaining.toFixed(2) + ' to goal ‚Ä¢ Keep going! üí™'; } // Update undo button elements.undoBtn.disabled = history.length === 0; // Update history updateHistory(); } // Update history display function updateHistory() { if (history.length === 0) { elements.historyList.innerHTML = '
Start adding earnings to see your progress! üéØ
'; return; } elements.historyList.innerHTML = history.map(entry => '
' + '
' + '
' + entry.platform + '
' + '
' + entry.time + '
' + '
' + '
+$' + entry.amount.toFixed(2) + '
' + '
' ).join(''); } // Add earning function addEarning(amount, platform) { totalEarnings += amount; taskCount++; // Add to history const now = new Date(); history.unshift({ amount: amount, platform: platform, time: now.toLocaleTimeString(), timestamp: now }); // Keep only last 20 entries if (history.length > 20) { history = history.slice(0, 20); } // Check milestones checkMilestones(); // Update UI updateUI(); // Show success showNotification('+$' + amount.toFixed(2) + ' from ' + platform + '! üí∞'); } // Check for milestones function checkMilestones() { const milestones = [5, 10, 25, 50, 100]; const currentMilestone = milestones.find(m => totalEarnings >= m && totalEarnings - history[0].amount < m); if (currentMilestone) { setTimeout(() => { showNotification('üéâ $' + currentMilestone + ' milestone reached! üéâ', 'milestone'); }, 500); } // Goal reached if (totalEarnings >= dailyGoal && totalEarnings - history[0].amount < dailyGoal) { setTimeout(() => { showNotification('üèÜ DAILY GOAL SMASHED! You are incredible! üèÜ', 'milestone'); }, 1000); } } // Select platform function selectPlatform(platform, amounts) { currentPlatform = platform; // Update quick buttons elements.quickGrid.innerHTML = amounts.map(amount => '' ).join(''); showNotification(platform + ' selected! Tap amounts below üéØ', 'milestone'); // Reset after 30 seconds setTimeout(() => { elements.quickGrid.innerHTML = '' + '' + '' + ''; }, 30000); } // Manual amount validation elements.manualInput.addEventListener('input', function() { const value = parseFloat(this.value); elements.manualBtn.disabled = !value || value <= 0; }); elements.manualInput.addEventListener('keypress', function(e) { if (e.key === 'Enter' && !elements.manualBtn.disabled) { addManualAmount(); } }); // Add manual amount function addManualAmount() { const amount = parseFloat(elements.manualInput.value); if (amount && amount > 0) { addEarning(amount, currentPlatform || 'Manual Entry'); elements.manualInput.value = ''; elements.manualBtn.disabled = true; } } // Goal editing function editGoal() { elements.goalArea.classList.add('hidden'); elements.goalInput.classList.remove('hidden'); elements.goalInput.value = dailyGoal.toFixed(2); elements.goalInput.focus(); elements.goalInput.select(); } elements.goalInput.addEventListener('blur', saveGoal); elements.goalInput.addEventListener('keypress', function(e) { if (e.key === 'Enter') saveGoal(); }); function saveGoal() { const newGoal = parseFloat(elements.goalInput.value); if (newGoal && newGoal > 0) { dailyGoal = newGoal; updateUI(); showNotification('Goal updated to $' + dailyGoal.toFixed(2) + '! üéØ'); } elements.goalInput.classList.add('hidden'); elements.goalArea.classList.remove('hidden'); } // Undo last function undoLast() { if (history.length > 0) { const last = history.shift(); totalEarnings -= last.amount; taskCount = Math.max(0, taskCount - 1); updateUI(); showNotification('Undid $' + last.amount.toFixed(2) + ' from ' + last.platform, 'error'); } } // Clear history function clearHistory() { if (confirm('Clear all earnings for today? This cannot be undone.')) { history = []; updateUI(); showNotification('History cleared! üßπ'); } } // Reset all function resetAll() { if (confirm('Reset everything? This will clear all earnings and reset your goal.')) { totalEarnings = 0; taskCount = 0; history = []; dailyGoal = 50; currentPlatform = ''; updateUI(); showNotification('Everything reset! Fresh start! üåÖ', 'milestone'); } } // Export data function exportData() { const today = new Date().toLocaleDateString(); const avgPerTask = taskCount > 0 ? (totalEarnings / taskCount).toFixed(2) : '0.00'; const textData = 'üß† ADHD Gig Tracker Report - ' + today + '\n\n' + 'üí∞ SUMMARY:\n' + '‚Ä¢ Total Earned: $' + totalEarnings.toFixed(2) + '\n' + '‚Ä¢ Daily Goal: $' + dailyGoal.toFixed(2) + ' (' + Math.round((totalEarnings / dailyGoal) * 100) + '% complete)\n' + '‚Ä¢ Tasks Completed: ' + taskCount + '\n' + '‚Ä¢ Average per Task: $' + avgPerTask + '\n\n' + 'üìú EARNINGS HISTORY:\n' + (history.length > 0 ? history.map(entry => '‚Ä¢ ' + entry.time + ' - ' + entry.platform + ': $' + entry.amount.toFixed(2)).join('\n') : '‚Ä¢ No earnings recorded yet' ) + '\n\n' + '---\nGenerated by ADHD Gig Tracker üéØ'; // Copy to clipboard navigator.clipboard.writeText(textData).then(() => { showNotification('Data copied to clipboard! üìã Paste anywhere!', 'milestone'); }).catch(() => { // Fallback for older browsers const textArea = document.createElement('textarea'); textArea.value = textData; document.body.appendChild(textArea); textArea.select(); document.execCommand('copy'); document.body.removeChild(textArea); showNotification('Data copied to clipboard! üìã', 'milestone'); }); } // Initialize app function init() { updateUI(); showNotification('Welcome back! Ready to earn some money? üöÄ', 'milestone'); } // Start the app if (document.readyState === 'loading') { document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', init); } else { init(); } + amount.toFixed(2) + ' from ' + platform + '! üí∞'); } // Check for milestones function checkMilestones() { const milestones = [5, 10, 25, 50, 100]; const currentMilestone = milestones.find(m => totalEarnings >= m && totalEarnings - history[0].amount < m); if (currentMilestone) { setTimeout(() => { showNotification('üéâ $' + currentMilestone + ' milestone reached! üéâ', 'milestone'); }, 500); } // Goal reached if (totalEarnings >= dailyGoal && totalEarnings - history[0].amount < dailyGoal) { setTimeout(() => { showNotification('üèÜ DAILY GOAL SMASHED! You are incredible! üèÜ', 'milestone'); }, 1000); } } // Select platform function selectPlatform(platform, amounts) { currentPlatform = platform; // Update quick buttons elements.quickGrid.innerHTML = amounts.map(amount => '' ).join(''); showNotification(platform + ' selected! Tap amounts below üéØ', 'milestone'); // Reset after 30 seconds setTimeout(() => { elements.quickGrid.innerHTML = '' + '' + '' + ''; }, 30000); } // Manual amount validation elements.manualInput.addEventListener('input', function() { const value = parseFloat(this.value); elements.manualBtn.disabled = !value || value <= 0; }); elements.manualInput.addEventListener('keypress', function(e) { if (e.key === 'Enter' && !elements.manualBtn.disabled) { addManualAmount(); } }); // Add manual amount function addManualAmount() { const amount = parseFloat(elements.manualInput.value); if (amount && amount > 0) { addEarning(amount, currentPlatform || 'Manual Entry'); elements.manualInput.value = ''; elements.manualBtn.disabled = true; } } // Goal editing function editGoal() { elements.goalArea.classList.add('hidden'); elements.goalInput.classList.remove('hidden'); elements.goalInput.value = dailyGoal.toFixed(2); elements.goalInput.focus(); elements.goalInput.select(); } elements.goalInput.addEventListener('blur', saveGoal); elements.goalInput.addEventListener('keypress', function(e) { if (e.key === 'Enter') saveGoal(); }); function saveGoal() { const newGoal = parseFloat(elements.goalInput.value); if (newGoal && newGoal > 0) { dailyGoal = newGoal; updateUI(); showNotification('Goal updated to $' + dailyGoal.toFixed(2) + '! üéØ'); } elements.goalInput.classList.add('hidden'); elements.goalArea.classList.remove('hidden'); } // Undo last function undoLast() { if (history.length > 0) { const last = history.shift(); totalEarnings -= last.amount; taskCount = Math.max(0, taskCount - 1); updateUI(); showNotification('Undid $' + last.amount.toFixed(2) + ' from ' + last.platform, 'error'); } } // Clear history function clearHistory() { if (confirm('Clear all earnings for today? This cannot be undone.')) { history = []; updateUI(); showNotification('History cleared! üßπ'); } } // Reset all function resetAll() { if (confirm('Reset everything? This will clear all earnings and reset your goal.')) { totalEarnings = 0; taskCount = 0; history = []; dailyGoal = 50; currentPlatform = ''; updateUI(); showNotification('Everything reset! Fresh start! üåÖ', 'milestone'); } } // Export data function exportData() { const today = new Date().toLocaleDateString(); const avgPerTask = taskCount > 0 ? (totalEarnings / taskCount).toFixed(2) : '0.00'; const textData = 'üß† ADHD Gig Tracker Report - ' + today + '\n\n' + 'üí∞ SUMMARY:\n' + '‚Ä¢ Total Earned: $' + totalEarnings.toFixed(2) + '\n' + '‚Ä¢ Daily Goal: $' + dailyGoal.toFixed(2) + ' (' + Math.round((totalEarnings / dailyGoal) * 100) + '% complete)\n' + '‚Ä¢ Tasks Completed: ' + taskCount + '\n' + '‚Ä¢ Average per Task: $' + avgPerTask + '\n\n' + 'üìú EARNINGS HISTORY:\n' + (history.length > 0 ? history.map(entry => '‚Ä¢ ' + entry.time + ' - ' + entry.platform + ': $' + entry.amount.toFixed(2)).join('\n') : '‚Ä¢ No earnings recorded yet' ) + '\n\n' + '---\nGenerated by ADHD Gig Tracker üéØ'; // Copy to clipboard navigator.clipboard.writeText(textData).then(() => { showNotification('Data copied to clipboard! üìã Paste anywhere!', 'milestone'); }).catch(() => { // Fallback for older browsers const textArea = document.createElement('textarea'); textArea.value = textData; document.body.appendChild(textArea); textArea.select(); document.execCommand('copy'); document.body.removeChild(textArea); showNotification('Data copied to clipboard! üìã', 'milestone'); }); } // Initialize app function init() { updateUI(); showNotification('Welcome back! Ready to earn some money? üöÄ', 'milestone'); } // Start the app if (document.readyState === 'loading') { document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', init); } else { init(); } + totalEarnings.toFixed(2); elements.todayTasks.textContent = taskCount; elements.streakDisplay.textContent = streak + 'üî•'; elements.goalAmount.textContent = dailyGoal.toFixed(2); // Update progress const progress = Math.min((totalEarnings / dailyGoal) * 100, 100); elements.progressFill.style.width = progress + '%'; elements.progressPercent.textContent = Math.round(progress) + '%'; // Update goal status if (totalEarnings >= dailyGoal) { elements.totalBox.classList.add('complete'); elements.progressFill.classList.add('complete'); elements.totalInfo.textContent = 'üèÜ GOAL CRUSHED! Amazing work!'; } else { elements.totalBox.classList.remove('complete'); elements.progressFill.classList.remove('complete'); const remaining = dailyGoal - totalEarnings; elements.totalInfo.textContent = ' // Update history display function updateHistory() { if (history.length === 0) { elements.historyList.innerHTML = '
Start adding earnings to see your progress! üéØ
'; return; } elements.historyList.innerHTML = history.map(entry => '
' + '
' + '
' + entry.platform + '
' + '
' + entry.time + '
' + '
' + '
+$' + entry.amount.toFixed(2) + '
' + '
' ).join(''); } // Add earning function addEarning(amount, platform) { totalEarnings += amount; taskCount++; // Add to history const now = new Date(); history.unshift({ amount: amount, platform: platform, time: now.toLocaleTimeString(), timestamp: now }); // Keep only last 20 entries if (history.length > 20) { history = history.slice(0, 20); } // Check milestones checkMilestones(); // Update UI updateUI(); // Show success showNotification('+$' + amount.toFixed(2) + ' from ' + platform + '! üí∞'); } // Check for milestones function checkMilestones() { const milestones = [5, 10, 25, 50, 100]; const currentMilestone = milestones.find(m => totalEarnings >= m && totalEarnings - history[0].amount < m); if (currentMilestone) { setTimeout(() => { showNotification('üéâ $' + currentMilestone + ' milestone reached! üéâ', 'milestone'); }, 500); } // Goal reached if (totalEarnings >= dailyGoal && totalEarnings - history[0].amount < dailyGoal) { setTimeout(() => { showNotification('üèÜ DAILY GOAL SMASHED! You are incredible! üèÜ', 'milestone'); }, 1000); } } // Select platform function selectPlatform(platform, amounts) { currentPlatform = platform; // Update quick buttons elements.quickGrid.innerHTML = amounts.map(amount => '' ).join(''); showNotification(platform + ' selected! Tap amounts below üéØ', 'milestone'); // Reset after 30 seconds setTimeout(() => { elements.quickGrid.innerHTML = '' + '' + '' + ''; }, 30000); } // Manual amount validation elements.manualInput.addEventListener('input', function() { const value = parseFloat(this.value); elements.manualBtn.disabled = !value || value <= 0; }); elements.manualInput.addEventListener('keypress', function(e) { if (e.key === 'Enter' && !elements.manualBtn.disabled) { addManualAmount(); } }); // Add manual amount function addManualAmount() { const amount = parseFloat(elements.manualInput.value); if (amount && amount > 0) { addEarning(amount, currentPlatform || 'Manual Entry'); elements.manualInput.value = ''; elements.manualBtn.disabled = true; } } // Goal editing function editGoal() { elements.goalArea.classList.add('hidden'); elements.goalInput.classList.remove('hidden'); elements.goalInput.value = dailyGoal.toFixed(2); elements.goalInput.focus(); elements.goalInput.select(); } elements.goalInput.addEventListener('blur', saveGoal); elements.goalInput.addEventListener('keypress', function(e) { if (e.key === 'Enter') saveGoal(); }); function saveGoal() { const newGoal = parseFloat(elements.goalInput.value); if (newGoal && newGoal > 0) { dailyGoal = newGoal; updateUI(); showNotification('Goal updated to $' + dailyGoal.toFixed(2) + '! üéØ'); } elements.goalInput.classList.add('hidden'); elements.goalArea.classList.remove('hidden'); } // Undo last function undoLast() { if (history.length > 0) { const last = history.shift(); totalEarnings -= last.amount; taskCount = Math.max(0, taskCount - 1); updateUI(); showNotification('Undid $' + last.amount.toFixed(2) + ' from ' + last.platform, 'error'); } } // Clear history function clearHistory() { if (confirm('Clear all earnings for today? This cannot be undone.')) { history = []; updateUI(); showNotification('History cleared! üßπ'); } } // Reset all function resetAll() { if (confirm('Reset everything? This will clear all earnings and reset your goal.')) { totalEarnings = 0; taskCount = 0; history = []; dailyGoal = 50; currentPlatform = ''; updateUI(); showNotification('Everything reset! Fresh start! üåÖ', 'milestone'); } } // Export data function exportData() { const today = new Date().toLocaleDateString(); const avgPerTask = taskCount > 0 ? (totalEarnings / taskCount).toFixed(2) : '0.00'; const textData = 'üß† ADHD Gig Tracker Report - ' + today + '\n\n' + 'üí∞ SUMMARY:\n' + '‚Ä¢ Total Earned: $' + totalEarnings.toFixed(2) + '\n' + '‚Ä¢ Daily Goal: $' + dailyGoal.toFixed(2) + ' (' + Math.round((totalEarnings / dailyGoal) * 100) + '% complete)\n' + '‚Ä¢ Tasks Completed: ' + taskCount + '\n' + '‚Ä¢ Average per Task: $' + avgPerTask + '\n\n' + 'üìú EARNINGS HISTORY:\n' + (history.length > 0 ? history.map(entry => '‚Ä¢ ' + entry.time + ' - ' + entry.platform + ': $' + entry.amount.toFixed(2)).join('\n') : '‚Ä¢ No earnings recorded yet' ) + '\n\n' + '---\nGenerated by ADHD Gig Tracker üéØ'; // Copy to clipboard navigator.clipboard.writeText(textData).then(() => { showNotification('Data copied to clipboard! üìã Paste anywhere!', 'milestone'); }).catch(() => { // Fallback for older browsers const textArea = document.createElement('textarea'); textArea.value = textData; document.body.appendChild(textArea); textArea.select(); document.execCommand('copy'); document.body.removeChild(textArea); showNotification('Data copied to clipboard! üìã', 'milestone'); }); } // Initialize app function init() { updateUI(); showNotification('Welcome back! Ready to earn some money? üöÄ', 'milestone'); } // Start the app if (document.readyState === 'loading') { document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', init); } else { init(); } + remaining.toFixed(2) + ' to goal ‚Ä¢ Keep going! üí™'; } // Update undo button elements.undoBtn.disabled = history.length === 0; // Update history updateHistory(); } // Update history display function updateHistory() { if (history.length === 0) { elements.historyList.innerHTML = '
Start adding earnings to see your progress! üéØ
'; return; } elements.historyList.innerHTML = history.map(entry => '
' + '
' + '
' + entry.platform + '
' + '
' + entry.time + '
' + '
' + '
+$' + entry.amount.toFixed(2) + '
' + '
' ).join(''); } // Add earning function addEarning(amount, platform) { totalEarnings += amount; taskCount++; // Add to history const now = new Date(); history.unshift({ amount: amount, platform: platform, time: now.toLocaleTimeString(), timestamp: now }); // Keep only last 20 entries if (history.length > 20) { history = history.slice(0, 20); } // Check milestones checkMilestones(); // Update UI updateUI(); // Show success showNotification('+$' + amount.toFixed(2) + ' from ' + platform + '! üí∞'); } // Check for milestones function checkMilestones() { const milestones = [5, 10, 25, 50, 100]; const currentMilestone = milestones.find(m => totalEarnings >= m && totalEarnings - history[0].amount < m); if (currentMilestone) { setTimeout(() => { showNotification('üéâ $' + currentMilestone + ' milestone reached! üéâ', 'milestone'); }, 500); } // Goal reached if (totalEarnings >= dailyGoal && totalEarnings - history[0].amount < dailyGoal) { setTimeout(() => { showNotification('üèÜ DAILY GOAL SMASHED! You are incredible! üèÜ', 'milestone'); }, 1000); } } // Select platform function selectPlatform(platform, amounts) { currentPlatform = platform; // Update quick buttons elements.quickGrid.innerHTML = amounts.map(amount => '' ).join(''); showNotification(platform + ' selected! Tap amounts below üéØ', 'milestone'); // Reset after 30 seconds setTimeout(() => { elements.quickGrid.innerHTML = '' + '' + '' + ''; }, 30000); } // Manual amount validation elements.manualInput.addEventListener('input', function() { const value = parseFloat(this.value); elements.manualBtn.disabled = !value || value <= 0; }); elements.manualInput.addEventListener('keypress', function(e) { if (e.key === 'Enter' && !elements.manualBtn.disabled) { addManualAmount(); } }); // Add manual amount function addManualAmount() { const amount = parseFloat(elements.manualInput.value); if (amount && amount > 0) { addEarning(amount, currentPlatform || 'Manual Entry'); elements.manualInput.value = ''; elements.manualBtn.disabled = true; } } // Goal editing function editGoal() { elements.goalArea.classList.add('hidden'); elements.goalInput.classList.remove('hidden'); elements.goalInput.value = dailyGoal.toFixed(2); elements.goalInput.focus(); elements.goalInput.select(); } elements.goalInput.addEventListener('blur', saveGoal); elements.goalInput.addEventListener('keypress', function(e) { if (e.key === 'Enter') saveGoal(); }); function saveGoal() { const newGoal = parseFloat(elements.goalInput.value); if (newGoal && newGoal > 0) { dailyGoal = newGoal; updateUI(); showNotification('Goal updated to $' + dailyGoal.toFixed(2) + '! üéØ'); } elements.goalInput.classList.add('hidden'); elements.goalArea.classList.remove('hidden'); } // Undo last function undoLast() { if (history.length > 0) { const last = history.shift(); totalEarnings -= last.amount; taskCount = Math.max(0, taskCount - 1); updateUI(); showNotification('Undid $' + last.amount.toFixed(2) + ' from ' + last.platform, 'error'); } } // Clear history function clearHistory() { if (confirm('Clear all earnings for today? This cannot be undone.')) { history = []; updateUI(); showNotification('History cleared! üßπ'); } } // Reset all function resetAll() { if (confirm('Reset everything? This will clear all earnings and reset your goal.')) { totalEarnings = 0; taskCount = 0; history = []; dailyGoal = 50; currentPlatform = ''; updateUI(); showNotification('Everything reset! Fresh start! üåÖ', 'milestone'); } } // Export data function exportData() { const today = new Date().toLocaleDateString(); const avgPerTask = taskCount > 0 ? (totalEarnings / taskCount).toFixed(2) : '0.00'; const textData = 'üß† ADHD Gig Tracker Report - ' + today + '\n\n' + 'üí∞ SUMMARY:\n' + '‚Ä¢ Total Earned: $' + totalEarnings.toFixed(2) + '\n' + '‚Ä¢ Daily Goal: $' + dailyGoal.toFixed(2) + ' (' + Math.round((totalEarnings / dailyGoal) * 100) + '% complete)\n' + '‚Ä¢ Tasks Completed: ' + taskCount + '\n' + '‚Ä¢ Average per Task: $' + avgPerTask + '\n\n' + 'üìú EARNINGS HISTORY:\n' + (history.length > 0 ? history.map(entry => '‚Ä¢ ' + entry.time + ' - ' + entry.platform + ': $' + entry.amount.toFixed(2)).join('\n') : '‚Ä¢ No earnings recorded yet' ) + '\n\n' + '---\nGenerated by ADHD Gig Tracker üéØ'; // Copy to clipboard navigator.clipboard.writeText(textData).then(() => { showNotification('Data copied to clipboard! üìã Paste anywhere!', 'milestone'); }).catch(() => { // Fallback for older browsers const textArea = document.createElement('textarea'); textArea.value = textData; document.body.appendChild(textArea); textArea.select(); document.execCommand('copy'); document.body.removeChild(textArea); showNotification('Data copied to clipboard! üìã', 'milestone'); }); } // Initialize app function init() { updateUI(); showNotification('Welcome back! Ready to earn some money? üöÄ', 'milestone'); } // Start the app if (document.readyState === 'loading') { document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', init); } else { init(); } + dailyGoal.toFixed(2) + '! üéØ'); } elements.goalInput.classList.add('hidden'); elements.goalArea.classList.remove('hidden'); } // Undo last function undoLast() { if (history.length > 0) { const last = history.shift(); totalEarnings -= last.amount; taskCount = Math.max(0, taskCount - 1); updateUI(); showNotification('Undid $' + last.amount.toFixed(2) + ' from ' + last.platform, 'error'); } } // Clear history function clearHistory() { if (confirm('Clear all earnings for today? This cannot be undone.')) { history = []; updateUI(); showNotification('History cleared! üßπ'); } } // Reset all function resetAll() { if (confirm('Reset everything? This will clear all earnings and reset your goal.')) { totalEarnings = 0; taskCount = 0; history = []; dailyGoal = 50; currentPlatform = ''; updateUI(); showNotification('Everything reset! Fresh start! üåÖ', 'milestone'); } } // Export data function exportData() { const today = new Date().toLocaleDateString(); const avgPerTask = taskCount > 0 ? (totalEarnings / taskCount).toFixed(2) : '0.00'; const textData = 'üß† ADHD Gig Tracker Report - ' + today + '\n\n' + 'üí∞ SUMMARY:\n' + '‚Ä¢ Total Earned: $' + totalEarnings.toFixed(2) + '\n' + '‚Ä¢ Daily Goal: $' + dailyGoal.toFixed(2) + ' (' + Math.round((totalEarnings / dailyGoal) * 100) + '% complete)\n' + '‚Ä¢ Tasks Completed: ' + taskCount + '\n' + '‚Ä¢ Average per Task: $' + avgPerTask + '\n\n' + 'üìú EARNINGS HISTORY:\n' + (history.length > 0 ? history.map(entry => '‚Ä¢ ' + entry.time + ' - ' + entry.platform + ': $' + entry.amount.toFixed(2)).join('\n') : '‚Ä¢ No earnings recorded yet' ) + '\n\n' + '---\nGenerated by ADHD Gig Tracker üéØ'; // Copy to clipboard navigator.clipboard.writeText(textData).then(() => { showNotification('Data copied to clipboard! üìã Paste anywhere!', 'milestone'); }).catch(() => { // Fallback for older browsers const textArea = document.createElement('textarea'); textArea.value = textData; document.body.appendChild(textArea); textArea.select(); document.execCommand('copy'); document.body.removeChild(textArea); showNotification('Data copied to clipboard! üìã', 'milestone'); }); } // Initialize app function init() { updateUI(); showNotification('Welcome back! Ready to earn some money? üöÄ', 'milestone'); } // Start the app if (document.readyState === 'loading') { document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', init); } else { init(); } + totalEarnings.toFixed(2); elements.todayTasks.textContent = taskCount; elements.streakDisplay.textContent = streak + 'üî•'; elements.goalAmount.textContent = dailyGoal.toFixed(2); // Update progress const progress = Math.min((totalEarnings / dailyGoal) * 100, 100); elements.progressFill.style.width = progress + '%'; elements.progressPercent.textContent = Math.round(progress) + '%'; // Update goal status if (totalEarnings >= dailyGoal) { elements.totalBox.classList.add('complete'); elements.progressFill.classList.add('complete'); elements.totalInfo.textContent = 'üèÜ GOAL CRUSHED! Amazing work!'; } else { elements.totalBox.classList.remove('complete'); elements.progressFill.classList.remove('complete'); const remaining = dailyGoal - totalEarnings; elements.totalInfo.textContent = ' // Update history display function updateHistory() { if (history.length === 0) { elements.historyList.innerHTML = '
Start adding earnings to see your progress! üéØ
'; return; } elements.historyList.innerHTML = history.map(entry => '
' + '
' + '
' + entry.platform + '
' + '
' + entry.time + '
' + '
' + '
+$' + entry.amount.toFixed(2) + '
' + '
' ).join(''); } // Add earning function addEarning(amount, platform) { totalEarnings += amount; taskCount++; // Add to history const now = new Date(); history.unshift({ amount: amount, platform: platform, time: now.toLocaleTimeString(), timestamp: now }); // Keep only last 20 entries if (history.length > 20) { history = history.slice(0, 20); } // Check milestones checkMilestones(); // Update UI updateUI(); // Show success showNotification('+$' + amount.toFixed(2) + ' from ' + platform + '! üí∞'); } // Check for milestones function checkMilestones() { const milestones = [5, 10, 25, 50, 100]; const currentMilestone = milestones.find(m => totalEarnings >= m && totalEarnings - history[0].amount < m); if (currentMilestone) { setTimeout(() => { showNotification('üéâ $' + currentMilestone + ' milestone reached! üéâ', 'milestone'); }, 500); } // Goal reached if (totalEarnings >= dailyGoal && totalEarnings - history[0].amount < dailyGoal) { setTimeout(() => { showNotification('üèÜ DAILY GOAL SMASHED! You are incredible! üèÜ', 'milestone'); }, 1000); } } // Select platform function selectPlatform(platform, amounts) { currentPlatform = platform; // Update quick buttons elements.quickGrid.innerHTML = amounts.map(amount => '' ).join(''); showNotification(platform + ' selected! Tap amounts below üéØ', 'milestone'); // Reset after 30 seconds setTimeout(() => { elements.quickGrid.innerHTML = '' + '' + '' + ''; }, 30000); } // Manual amount validation elements.manualInput.addEventListener('input', function() { const value = parseFloat(this.value); elements.manualBtn.disabled = !value || value <= 0; }); elements.manualInput.addEventListener('keypress', function(e) { if (e.key === 'Enter' && !elements.manualBtn.disabled) { addManualAmount(); } }); // Add manual amount function addManualAmount() { const amount = parseFloat(elements.manualInput.value); if (amount && amount > 0) { addEarning(amount, currentPlatform || 'Manual Entry'); elements.manualInput.value = ''; elements.manualBtn.disabled = true; } } // Goal editing function editGoal() { elements.goalArea.classList.add('hidden'); elements.goalInput.classList.remove('hidden'); elements.goalInput.value = dailyGoal.toFixed(2); elements.goalInput.focus(); elements.goalInput.select(); } elements.goalInput.addEventListener('blur', saveGoal); elements.goalInput.addEventListener('keypress', function(e) { if (e.key === 'Enter') saveGoal(); }); function saveGoal() { const newGoal = parseFloat(elements.goalInput.value); if (newGoal && newGoal > 0) { dailyGoal = newGoal; updateUI(); showNotification('Goal updated to $' + dailyGoal.toFixed(2) + '! üéØ'); } elements.goalInput.classList.add('hidden'); elements.goalArea.classList.remove('hidden'); } // Undo last function undoLast() { if (history.length > 0) { const last = history.shift(); totalEarnings -= last.amount; taskCount = Math.max(0, taskCount - 1); updateUI(); showNotification('Undid $' + last.amount.toFixed(2) + ' from ' + last.platform, 'error'); } } // Clear history function clearHistory() { if (confirm('Clear all earnings for today? This cannot be undone.')) { history = []; updateUI(); showNotification('History cleared! üßπ'); } } // Reset all function resetAll() { if (confirm('Reset everything? This will clear all earnings and reset your goal.')) { totalEarnings = 0; taskCount = 0; history = []; dailyGoal = 50; currentPlatform = ''; updateUI(); showNotification('Everything reset! Fresh start! üåÖ', 'milestone'); } } // Export data function exportData() { const today = new Date().toLocaleDateString(); const avgPerTask = taskCount > 0 ? (totalEarnings / taskCount).toFixed(2) : '0.00'; const textData = 'üß† ADHD Gig Tracker Report - ' + today + '\n\n' + 'üí∞ SUMMARY:\n' + '‚Ä¢ Total Earned: $' + totalEarnings.toFixed(2) + '\n' + '‚Ä¢ Daily Goal: $' + dailyGoal.toFixed(2) + ' (' + Math.round((totalEarnings / dailyGoal) * 100) + '% complete)\n' + '‚Ä¢ Tasks Completed: ' + taskCount + '\n' + '‚Ä¢ Average per Task: $' + avgPerTask + '\n\n' + 'üìú EARNINGS HISTORY:\n' + (history.length > 0 ? history.map(entry => '‚Ä¢ ' + entry.time + ' - ' + entry.platform + ': $' + entry.amount.toFixed(2)).join('\n') : '‚Ä¢ No earnings recorded yet' ) + '\n\n' + '---\nGenerated by ADHD Gig Tracker üéØ'; // Copy to clipboard navigator.clipboard.writeText(textData).then(() => { showNotification('Data copied to clipboard! üìã Paste anywhere!', 'milestone'); }).catch(() => { // Fallback for older browsers const textArea = document.createElement('textarea'); textArea.value = textData; document.body.appendChild(textArea); textArea.select(); document.execCommand('copy'); document.body.removeChild(textArea); showNotification('Data copied to clipboard! üìã', 'milestone'); }); } // Initialize app function init() { updateUI(); showNotification('Welcome back! Ready to earn some money? üöÄ', 'milestone'); } // Start the app if (document.readyState === 'loading') { document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', init); } else { init(); } + remaining.toFixed(2) + ' to goal ‚Ä¢ Keep going! üí™'; } // Update undo button elements.undoBtn.disabled = history.length === 0; // Update history updateHistory(); } // Update history display function updateHistory() { if (history.length === 0) { elements.historyList.innerHTML = '
Start adding earnings to see your progress! üéØ
'; return; } elements.historyList.innerHTML = history.map(entry => '
' + '
' + '
' + entry.platform + '
' + '
' + entry.time + '
' + '
' + '
+$' + entry.amount.toFixed(2) + '
' + '
' ).join(''); } // Add earning function addEarning(amount, platform) { totalEarnings += amount; taskCount++; // Add to history const now = new Date(); history.unshift({ amount: amount, platform: platform, time: now.toLocaleTimeString(), timestamp: now }); // Keep only last 20 entries if (history.length > 20) { history = history.slice(0, 20); } // Check milestones checkMilestones(); // Update UI updateUI(); // Show success showNotification('+$' + amount.toFixed(2) + ' from ' + platform + '! üí∞'); } // Check for milestones function checkMilestones() { const milestones = [5, 10, 25, 50, 100]; const currentMilestone = milestones.find(m => totalEarnings >= m && totalEarnings - history[0].amount < m); if (currentMilestone) { setTimeout(() => { showNotification('üéâ $' + currentMilestone + ' milestone reached! üéâ', 'milestone'); }, 500); } // Goal reached if (totalEarnings >= dailyGoal && totalEarnings - history[0].amount < dailyGoal) { setTimeout(() => { showNotification('üèÜ DAILY GOAL SMASHED! You are incredible! üèÜ', 'milestone'); }, 1000); } } // Select platform function selectPlatform(platform, amounts) { currentPlatform = platform; // Update quick buttons elements.quickGrid.innerHTML = amounts.map(amount => '' ).join(''); showNotification(platform + ' selected! Tap amounts below üéØ', 'milestone'); // Reset after 30 seconds setTimeout(() => { elements.quickGrid.innerHTML = '' + '' + '' + ''; }, 30000); } // Manual amount validation elements.manualInput.addEventListener('input', function() { const value = parseFloat(this.value); elements.manualBtn.disabled = !value || value <= 0; }); elements.manualInput.addEventListener('keypress', function(e) { if (e.key === 'Enter' && !elements.manualBtn.disabled) { addManualAmount(); } }); // Add manual amount function addManualAmount() { const amount = parseFloat(elements.manualInput.value); if (amount && amount > 0) { addEarning(amount, currentPlatform || 'Manual Entry'); elements.manualInput.value = ''; elements.manualBtn.disabled = true; } } // Goal editing function editGoal() { elements.goalArea.classList.add('hidden'); elements.goalInput.classList.remove('hidden'); elements.goalInput.value = dailyGoal.toFixed(2); elements.goalInput.focus(); elements.goalInput.select(); } elements.goalInput.addEventListener('blur', saveGoal); elements.goalInput.addEventListener('keypress', function(e) { if (e.key === 'Enter') saveGoal(); }); function saveGoal() { const newGoal = parseFloat(elements.goalInput.value); if (newGoal && newGoal > 0) { dailyGoal = newGoal; updateUI(); showNotification('Goal updated to $' + dailyGoal.toFixed(2) + '! üéØ'); } elements.goalInput.classList.add('hidden'); elements.goalArea.classList.remove('hidden'); } // Undo last function undoLast() { if (history.length > 0) { const last = history.shift(); totalEarnings -= last.amount; taskCount = Math.max(0, taskCount - 1); updateUI(); showNotification('Undid $' + last.amount.toFixed(2) + ' from ' + last.platform, 'error'); } } // Clear history function clearHistory() { if (confirm('Clear all earnings for today? This cannot be undone.')) { history = []; updateUI(); showNotification('History cleared! üßπ'); } } // Reset all function resetAll() { if (confirm('Reset everything? This will clear all earnings and reset your goal.')) { totalEarnings = 0; taskCount = 0; history = []; dailyGoal = 50; currentPlatform = ''; updateUI(); showNotification('Everything reset! Fresh start! üåÖ', 'milestone'); } } // Export data function exportData() { const today = new Date().toLocaleDateString(); const avgPerTask = taskCount > 0 ? (totalEarnings / taskCount).toFixed(2) : '0.00'; const textData = 'üß† ADHD Gig Tracker Report - ' + today + '\n\n' + 'üí∞ SUMMARY:\n' + '‚Ä¢ Total Earned: $' + totalEarnings.toFixed(2) + '\n' + '‚Ä¢ Daily Goal: $' + dailyGoal.toFixed(2) + ' (' + Math.round((totalEarnings / dailyGoal) * 100) + '% complete)\n' + '‚Ä¢ Tasks Completed: ' + taskCount + '\n' + '‚Ä¢ Average per Task: $' + avgPerTask + '\n\n' + 'üìú EARNINGS HISTORY:\n' + (history.length > 0 ? history.map(entry => '‚Ä¢ ' + entry.time + ' - ' + entry.platform + ': $' + entry.amount.toFixed(2)).join('\n') : '‚Ä¢ No earnings recorded yet' ) + '\n\n' + '---\nGenerated by ADHD Gig Tracker üéØ'; // Copy to clipboard navigator.clipboard.writeText(textData).then(() => { showNotification('Data copied to clipboard! üìã Paste anywhere!', 'milestone'); }).catch(() => { // Fallback for older browsers const textArea = document.createElement('textarea'); textArea.value = textData; document.body.appendChild(textArea); textArea.select(); document.execCommand('copy'); document.body.removeChild(textArea); showNotification('Data copied to clipboard! üìã', 'milestone'); }); } // Initialize app function init() { updateUI(); showNotification('Welcome back! Ready to earn some money? üöÄ', 'milestone'); } // Start the app if (document.readyState === 'loading') { document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', init); } else { init(); } + amount.toFixed(2) + ' from ' + platform + '! üí∞'); } // Check for milestones function checkMilestones() { const milestones = [5, 10, 25, 50, 100]; const currentMilestone = milestones.find(m => totalEarnings >= m && totalEarnings - history[0].amount < m); if (currentMilestone) { setTimeout(() => { showNotification('üéâ $' + currentMilestone + ' milestone reached! üéâ', 'milestone'); }, 500); } // Goal reached if (totalEarnings >= dailyGoal && totalEarnings - history[0].amount < dailyGoal) { setTimeout(() => { showNotification('üèÜ DAILY GOAL SMASHED! You are incredible! üèÜ', 'milestone'); }, 1000); } } // Select platform function selectPlatform(platform, amounts) { currentPlatform = platform; // Update quick buttons elements.quickGrid.innerHTML = amounts.map(amount => '' ).join(''); showNotification(platform + ' selected! Tap amounts below üéØ', 'milestone'); // Reset after 30 seconds setTimeout(() => { elements.quickGrid.innerHTML = '' + '' + '' + ''; }, 30000); } // Manual amount validation elements.manualInput.addEventListener('input', function() { const value = parseFloat(this.value); elements.manualBtn.disabled = !value || value <= 0; }); elements.manualInput.addEventListener('keypress', function(e) { if (e.key === 'Enter' && !elements.manualBtn.disabled) { addManualAmount(); } }); // Add manual amount function addManualAmount() { const amount = parseFloat(elements.manualInput.value); if (amount && amount > 0) { addEarning(amount, currentPlatform || 'Manual Entry'); elements.manualInput.value = ''; elements.manualBtn.disabled = true; } } // Goal editing function editGoal() { elements.goalArea.classList.add('hidden'); elements.goalInput.classList.remove('hidden'); elements.goalInput.value = dailyGoal.toFixed(2); elements.goalInput.focus(); elements.goalInput.select(); } elements.goalInput.addEventListener('blur', saveGoal); elements.goalInput.addEventListener('keypress', function(e) { if (e.key === 'Enter') saveGoal(); }); function saveGoal() { const newGoal = parseFloat(elements.goalInput.value); if (newGoal && newGoal > 0) { dailyGoal = newGoal; updateUI(); showNotification('Goal updated to $' + dailyGoal.toFixed(2) + '! üéØ'); } elements.goalInput.classList.add('hidden'); elements.goalArea.classList.remove('hidden'); } // Undo last function undoLast() { if (history.length > 0) { const last = history.shift(); totalEarnings -= last.amount; taskCount = Math.max(0, taskCount - 1); updateUI(); showNotification('Undid $' + last.amount.toFixed(2) + ' from ' + last.platform, 'error'); } } // Clear history function clearHistory() { if (confirm('Clear all earnings for today? This cannot be undone.')) { history = []; updateUI(); showNotification('History cleared! üßπ'); } } // Reset all function resetAll() { if (confirm('Reset everything? This will clear all earnings and reset your goal.')) { totalEarnings = 0; taskCount = 0; history = []; dailyGoal = 50; currentPlatform = ''; updateUI(); showNotification('Everything reset! Fresh start! üåÖ', 'milestone'); } } // Export data function exportData() { const today = new Date().toLocaleDateString(); const avgPerTask = taskCount > 0 ? (totalEarnings / taskCount).toFixed(2) : '0.00'; const textData = 'üß† ADHD Gig Tracker Report - ' + today + '\n\n' + 'üí∞ SUMMARY:\n' + '‚Ä¢ Total Earned: $' + totalEarnings.toFixed(2) + '\n' + '‚Ä¢ Daily Goal: $' + dailyGoal.toFixed(2) + ' (' + Math.round((totalEarnings / dailyGoal) * 100) + '% complete)\n' + '‚Ä¢ Tasks Completed: ' + taskCount + '\n' + '‚Ä¢ Average per Task: $' + avgPerTask + '\n\n' + 'üìú EARNINGS HISTORY:\n' + (history.length > 0 ? history.map(entry => '‚Ä¢ ' + entry.time + ' - ' + entry.platform + ': $' + entry.amount.toFixed(2)).join('\n') : '‚Ä¢ No earnings recorded yet' ) + '\n\n' + '---\nGenerated by ADHD Gig Tracker üéØ'; // Copy to clipboard navigator.clipboard.writeText(textData).then(() => { showNotification('Data copied to clipboard! üìã Paste anywhere!', 'milestone'); }).catch(() => { // Fallback for older browsers const textArea = document.createElement('textarea'); textArea.value = textData; document.body.appendChild(textArea); textArea.select(); document.execCommand('copy'); document.body.removeChild(textArea); showNotification('Data copied to clipboard! üìã', 'milestone'); }); } // Initialize app function init() { updateUI(); showNotification('Welcome back! Ready to earn some money? üöÄ', 'milestone'); } // Start the app if (document.readyState === 'loading') { document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', init); } else { init(); } + totalEarnings.toFixed(2); elements.todayTasks.textContent = taskCount; elements.streakDisplay.textContent = streak + 'üî•'; elements.goalAmount.textContent = dailyGoal.toFixed(2); // Update progress const progress = Math.min((totalEarnings / dailyGoal) * 100, 100); elements.progressFill.style.width = progress + '%'; elements.progressPercent.textContent = Math.round(progress) + '%'; // Update goal status if (totalEarnings >= dailyGoal) { elements.totalBox.classList.add('complete'); elements.progressFill.classList.add('complete'); elements.totalInfo.textContent = 'üèÜ GOAL CRUSHED! Amazing work!'; } else { elements.totalBox.classList.remove('complete'); elements.progressFill.classList.remove('complete'); const remaining = dailyGoal - totalEarnings; elements.totalInfo.textContent = ' // Update history display function updateHistory() { if (history.length === 0) { elements.historyList.innerHTML = '
Start adding earnings to see your progress! üéØ
'; return; } elements.historyList.innerHTML = history.map(entry => '

You are incredible! üèÜ', 'milestone'); }, 1000); } } // Select platform function selectPlatform(platform, amounts) { currentPlatform = platform; // Update quick buttons elements.quickGrid.innerHTML = amounts.map(amount => '' ).join(''); showNotification(platform + ' selected! Tap amounts below üéØ', 'milestone'); // Reset after 30 seconds setTimeout(() => { elements.quickGrid.innerHTML = '' + '' + '' + ''; }, 30000); } // Manual amount validation elements.manualInput.addEventListener('input', function() { const value = parseFloat(this.value); elements.manualBtn.disabled = !value || value <= 0; }); elements.manualInput.addEventListener('keypress', function(e) { if (e.key === 'Enter' && !elements.manualBtn.disabled) { addManualAmount(); } }); // Add manual amount function addManualAmount() { const amount = parseFloat(elements.manualInput.value); if (amount && amount > 0) { addEarning(amount, currentPlatform || 'Manual Entry'); elements.manualInput.value = ''; elements.manualBtn.disabled = true; } } // Goal editing function editGoal() { elements.goalArea.classList.add('hidden'); elements.goalInput.classList.remove('hidden'); elements.goalInput.value = dailyGoal.toFixed(2); elements.goalInput.focus(); elements.goalInput.select(); } elements.goalInput.addEventListener('blur', saveGoal); elements.goalInput.addEventListener('keypress', function(e) { if (e.key === 'Enter') saveGoal(); }); function saveGoal() { const newGoal = parseFloat(elements.goalInput.value); if (newGoal && newGoal > 0) { dailyGoal = newGoal; updateUI(); showNotification('Goal updated to $' + dailyGoal.toFixed(2) + '! üéØ'); } elements.goalInput.classList.add('hidden'); elements.goalArea.classList.remove('hidden'); } // Undo last function undoLast() { if (history.length > 0) { const last = history.shift(); totalEarnings -= last.amount; taskCount = Math.max(0, taskCount - 1); updateUI(); showNotification('Undid $' + last.amount.toFixed(2) + ' from ' + last.platform, 'error'); } } // Clear history function clearHistory() { if (confirm('Clear all earnings for today? This cannot be undone.')) { history = []; updateUI(); showNotification('History cleared! üßπ'); } } // Reset all function resetAll() { if (confirm('Reset everything? This will clear all earnings and reset your goal.')) { totalEarnings = 0; taskCount = 0; history = []; dailyGoal = 50; currentPlatform = ''; updateUI(); showNotification('Everything reset! Fresh start! üåÖ', 'milestone'); } } // Export data function exportData() { const today = new Date().toLocaleDateString(); const avgPerTask = taskCount > 0 ? (totalEarnings / taskCount).toFixed(2) : '0.00'; const textData = 'üß† ADHD Gig Tracker Report - ' + today + '\n\n' + 'üí∞ SUMMARY:\n' + '‚Ä¢ Total Earned: $' + totalEarnings.toFixed(2) + '\n' + '‚Ä¢ Daily Goal: $' + dailyGoal.toFixed(2) + ' (' + Math.round((totalEarnings / dailyGoal) * 100) + '% complete)\n' + '‚Ä¢ Tasks Completed: ' + taskCount + '\n' + '‚Ä¢ Average per Task: $' + avgPerTask + '\n\n' + 'üìú EARNINGS HISTORY:\n' + (history.length > 0 ? history.map(entry => '‚Ä¢ ' + entry.time + ' - ' + entry.platform + ': $' + entry.amount.toFixed(2)).join('\n') : '‚Ä¢ No earnings recorded yet' ) + '\n\n' + '---\nGenerated by ADHD Gig Tracker üéØ'; // Copy to clipboard navigator.clipboard.writeText(textData).then(() => { showNotification('Data copied to clipboard! üìã Paste anywhere!', 'milestone'); }).catch(() => { // Fallback for older browsers const textArea = document.createElement('textarea'); textArea.value = textData; document.body.appendChild(textArea); textArea.select(); document.execCommand('copy'); document.body.removeChild(textArea); showNotification('Data copied to clipboard! üìã', 'milestone'); }); } // Initialize app function init() { updateUI(); showNotification('Welcome back! Ready to earn some money? üöÄ', 'milestone'); } // Start the app if (document.readyState === 'loading') { document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', init); } else { init(); } + remaining.toFixed(2) + ' to goal ‚Ä¢ Keep going! üí™'; } // Update undo button elements.undoBtn.disabled = history.length === 0; // Update history updateHistory(); } // Update history display function updateHistory() { if (history.length === 0) { elements.historyList.innerHTML = '
Start adding earnings to see your progress! üéØ
'; return; } elements.historyList.innerHTML = history.map(entry => '
' + '
' + '
' + entry.platform + '
' + '
' + entry.time + '
' + '
' + '
+$' + entry.amount.toFixed(2) + '
' + '
' ).join(''); } // Add earning function addEarning(amount, platform) { totalEarnings += amount; taskCount++; // Add to history const now = new Date(); history.unshift({ amount: amount, platform: platform, time: now.toLocaleTimeString(), timestamp: now }); // Keep only last 20 entries if (history.length > 20) { history = history.slice(0, 20); } // Check milestones checkMilestones(); // Update UI updateUI(); // Show success showNotification('+$' + amount.toFixed(2) + ' from ' + platform + '! üí∞'); } // Check for milestones function checkMilestones() { const milestones = [5, 10, 25, 50, 100]; const currentMilestone = milestones.find(m => totalEarnings >= m && totalEarnings - history[0].amount < m); if (currentMilestone) { setTimeout(() => { showNotification('üéâ $' + currentMilestone + ' milestone reached! üéâ', 'milestone'); }, 500); } // Goal reached if (totalEarnings >= dailyGoal && totalEarnings - history[0].amount < dailyGoal) { setTimeout(() => { showNotification('üèÜ DAILY GOAL SMASHED! You are incredible! üèÜ', 'milestone'); }, 1000); } } // Select platform function selectPlatform(platform, amounts) { currentPlatform = platform; // Update quick buttons elements.quickGrid.innerHTML = amounts.map(amount => '' ).join(''); showNotification(platform + ' selected! Tap amounts below üéØ', 'milestone'); // Reset after 30 seconds setTimeout(() => { elements.quickGrid.innerHTML = '' + '' + '' + ''; }, 30000); } // Manual amount validation elements.manualInput.addEventListener('input', function() { const value = parseFloat(this.value); elements.manualBtn.disabled = !value || value <= 0; }); elements.manualInput.addEventListener('keypress', function(e) { if (e.key === 'Enter' && !elements.manualBtn.disabled) { addManualAmount(); } }); // Add manual amount function addManualAmount() { const amount = parseFloat(elements.manualInput.value); if (amount && amount > 0) { addEarning(amount, currentPlatform || 'Manual Entry'); elements.manualInput.value = ''; elements.manualBtn.disabled = true; } } // Goal editing function editGoal() { elements.goalArea.classList.add('hidden'); elements.goalInput.classList.remove('hidden'); elements.goalInput.value = dailyGoal.toFixed(2); elements.goalInput.focus(); elements.goalInput.select(); } elements.goalInput.addEventListener('blur', saveGoal); elements.goalInput.addEventListener('keypress', function(e) { if (e.key === 'Enter') saveGoal(); }); function saveGoal() { const newGoal = parseFloat(elements.goalInput.value); if (newGoal && newGoal > 0) { dailyGoal = newGoal; updateUI(); showNotification('Goal updated to $' + dailyGoal.toFixed(2) + '! üéØ'); } elements.goalInput.classList.add('hidden'); elements.goalArea.classList.remove('hidden'); } // Undo last function undoLast() { if (history.length > 0) { const last = history.shift(); totalEarnings -= last.amount; taskCount = Math.max(0, taskCount - 1); updateUI(); showNotification('Undid $' + last.amount.toFixed(2) + ' from ' + last.platform, 'error'); } } // Clear history function clearHistory() { if (confirm('Clear all earnings for today? This cannot be undone.')) { history = []; updateUI(); showNotification('History cleared! üßπ'); } } // Reset all function resetAll() { if (confirm('Reset everything? This will clear all earnings and reset your goal.')) { totalEarnings = 0; taskCount = 0; history = []; dailyGoal = 50; currentPlatform = ''; updateUI(); showNotification('Everything reset! Fresh start! üåÖ', 'milestone'); } } // Export data function exportData() { const today = new Date().toLocaleDateString(); const avgPerTask = taskCount > 0 ? (totalEarnings / taskCount).toFixed(2) : '0.00'; const textData = 'üß† ADHD Gig Tracker Report - ' + today + '\n\n' + 'üí∞ SUMMARY:\n' + '‚Ä¢ Total Earned: $' + totalEarnings.toFixed(2) + '\n' + '‚Ä¢ Daily Goal: $' + dailyGoal.toFixed(2) + ' (' + Math.round((totalEarnings / dailyGoal) * 100) + '% complete)\n' + '‚Ä¢ Tasks Completed: ' + taskCount + '\n' + '‚Ä¢ Average per Task: $' + avgPerTask + '\n\n' + 'üìú EARNINGS HISTORY:\n' + (history.length > 0 ? history.map(entry => '‚Ä¢ ' + entry.time + ' - ' + entry.platform + ': $' + entry.amount.toFixed(2)).join('\n') : '‚Ä¢ No earnings recorded yet' ) + '\n\n' + '---\nGenerated by ADHD Gig Tracker üéØ'; // Copy to clipboard navigator.clipboard.writeText(textData).then(() => { showNotification('Data copied to clipboard! üìã Paste anywhere!', 'milestone'); }).catch(() => { // Fallback for older browsers const textArea = document.createElement('textarea'); textArea.value = textData; document.body.appendChild(textArea); textArea.select(); document.execCommand('copy'); document.body.removeChild(textArea); showNotification('Data copied to clipboard! üìã', 'milestone'); }); } // Initialize app function init() { updateUI(); showNotification('Welcome back! Ready to earn some money? üöÄ', 'milestone'); } // Start the app if (document.readyState === 'loading') { document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', init); } else { init(); } + last.amount.toFixed(2) + ' from ' + last.platform, 'error'); } } // Clear history function clearHistory() { if (confirm('Clear all earnings for today? This cannot be undone.')) { history = []; updateUI(); showNotification('History cleared! üßπ'); } } // Reset all function resetAll() { if (confirm('Reset everything? This will clear all earnings and reset your goal.')) { totalEarnings = 0; taskCount = 0; history = []; dailyGoal = 50; currentPlatform = ''; updateUI(); showNotification('Everything reset! Fresh start! üåÖ', 'milestone'); } } // Export data function exportData() { const today = new Date().toLocaleDateString(); const avgPerTask = taskCount > 0 ? (totalEarnings / taskCount).toFixed(2) : '0.00'; const textData = 'üß† ADHD Gig Tracker Report - ' + today + '\n\n' + 'üí∞ SUMMARY:\n' + '‚Ä¢ Total Earned: $' + totalEarnings.toFixed(2) + '\n' + '‚Ä¢ Daily Goal: $' + dailyGoal.toFixed(2) + ' (' + Math.round((totalEarnings / dailyGoal) * 100) + '% complete)\n' + '‚Ä¢ Tasks Completed: ' + taskCount + '\n' + '‚Ä¢ Average per Task: $' + avgPerTask + '\n\n' + 'üìú EARNINGS HISTORY:\n' + (history.length > 0 ? history.map(entry => '‚Ä¢ ' + entry.time + ' - ' + entry.platform + ': $' + entry.amount.toFixed(2)).join('\n') : '‚Ä¢ No earnings recorded yet' ) + '\n\n' + '---\nGenerated by ADHD Gig Tracker üéØ'; // Copy to clipboard navigator.clipboard.writeText(textData).then(() => { showNotification('Data copied to clipboard! üìã Paste anywhere!', 'milestone'); }).catch(() => { // Fallback for older browsers const textArea = document.createElement('textarea'); textArea.value = textData; document.body.appendChild(textArea); textArea.select(); document.execCommand('copy'); document.body.removeChild(textArea); showNotification('Data copied to clipboard! üìã', 'milestone'); }); } // Initialize app function init() { updateUI(); showNotification('Welcome back! Ready to earn some money? üöÄ', 'milestone'); } // Start the app if (document.readyState === 'loading') { document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', init); } else { init(); } + totalEarnings.toFixed(2); elements.todayTasks.textContent = taskCount; elements.streakDisplay.textContent = streak + 'üî•'; elements.goalAmount.textContent = dailyGoal.toFixed(2); // Update progress const progress = Math.min((totalEarnings / dailyGoal) * 100, 100); elements.progressFill.style.width = progress + '%'; elements.progressPercent.textContent = Math.round(progress) + '%'; // Update goal status if (totalEarnings >= dailyGoal) { elements.totalBox.classList.add('complete'); elements.progressFill.classList.add('complete'); elements.totalInfo.textContent = 'üèÜ GOAL CRUSHED! Amazing work!'; } else { elements.totalBox.classList.remove('complete'); elements.progressFill.classList.remove('complete'); const remaining = dailyGoal - totalEarnings; elements.totalInfo.textContent = ' // Update history display function updateHistory() { if (history.length === 0) { elements.historyList.innerHTML = '
Start adding earnings to see your progress! üéØ
'; return; } elements.historyList.innerHTML = history.map(entry => '
' + '
' + '
' + entry.platform + '
' + '
' + entry.time + '
' + '
' + '
+$' + entry.amount.toFixed(2) + '
' + '
' ).join(''); } // Add earning function addEarning(amount, platform) { totalEarnings += amount; taskCount++; // Add to history const now = new Date(); history.unshift({ amount: amount, platform: platform, time: now.toLocaleTimeString(), timestamp: now }); // Keep only last 20 entries if (history.length > 20) { history = history.slice(0, 20); } // Check milestones checkMilestones(); // Update UI updateUI(); // Show success showNotification('+$' + amount.toFixed(2) + ' from ' + platform + '! üí∞'); } // Check for milestones function checkMilestones() { const milestones = [5, 10, 25, 50, 100]; const currentMilestone = milestones.find(m => totalEarnings >= m && totalEarnings - history[0].amount < m); if (currentMilestone) { setTimeout(() => { showNotification('üéâ $' + currentMilestone + ' milestone reached! üéâ', 'milestone'); }, 500); } // Goal reached if (totalEarnings >= dailyGoal && totalEarnings - history[0].amount < dailyGoal) { setTimeout(() => { showNotification('üèÜ DAILY GOAL SMASHED! You are incredible! üèÜ', 'milestone'); }, 1000); } } // Select platform function selectPlatform(platform, amounts) { currentPlatform = platform; // Update quick buttons elements.quickGrid.innerHTML = amounts.map(amount => '' ).join(''); showNotification(platform + ' selected! Tap amounts below üéØ', 'milestone'); // Reset after 30 seconds setTimeout(() => { elements.quickGrid.innerHTML = '' + '' + '' + ''; }, 30000); } // Manual amount validation elements.manualInput.addEventListener('input', function() { const value = parseFloat(this.value); elements.manualBtn.disabled = !value || value <= 0; }); elements.manualInput.addEventListener('keypress', function(e) { if (e.key === 'Enter' && !elements.manualBtn.disabled) { addManualAmount(); } }); // Add manual amount function addManualAmount() { const amount = parseFloat(elements.manualInput.value); if (amount && amount > 0) { addEarning(amount, currentPlatform || 'Manual Entry'); elements.manualInput.value = ''; elements.manualBtn.disabled = true; } } // Goal editing function editGoal() { elements.goalArea.classList.add('hidden'); elements.goalInput.classList.remove('hidden'); elements.goalInput.value = dailyGoal.toFixed(2); elements.goalInput.focus(); elements.goalInput.select(); } elements.goalInput.addEventListener('blur', saveGoal); elements.goalInput.addEventListener('keypress', function(e) { if (e.key === 'Enter') saveGoal(); }); function saveGoal() { const newGoal = parseFloat(elements.goalInput.value); if (newGoal && newGoal > 0) { dailyGoal = newGoal; updateUI(); showNotification('Goal updated to $' + dailyGoal.toFixed(2) + '! üéØ'); } elements.goalInput.classList.add('hidden'); elements.goalArea.classList.remove('hidden'); } // Undo last function undoLast() { if (history.length > 0) { const last = history.shift(); totalEarnings -= last.amount; taskCount = Math.max(0, taskCount - 1); updateUI(); showNotification('Undid $' + last.amount.toFixed(2) + ' from ' + last.platform, 'error'); } } // Clear history function clearHistory() { if (confirm('Clear all earnings for today? This cannot be undone.')) { history = []; updateUI(); showNotification('History cleared! üßπ'); } } // Reset all function resetAll() { if (confirm('Reset everything? This will clear all earnings and reset your goal.')) { totalEarnings = 0; taskCount = 0; history = []; dailyGoal = 50; currentPlatform = ''; updateUI(); showNotification('Everything reset! Fresh start! üåÖ', 'milestone'); } } // Export data function exportData() { const today = new Date().toLocaleDateString(); const avgPerTask = taskCount > 0 ? (totalEarnings / taskCount).toFixed(2) : '0.00'; const textData = 'üß† ADHD Gig Tracker Report - ' + today + '\n\n' + 'üí∞ SUMMARY:\n' + '‚Ä¢ Total Earned: $' + totalEarnings.toFixed(2) + '\n' + '‚Ä¢ Daily Goal: $' + dailyGoal.toFixed(2) + ' (' + Math.round((totalEarnings / dailyGoal) * 100) + '% complete)\n' + '‚Ä¢ Tasks Completed: ' + taskCount + '\n' + '‚Ä¢ Average per Task: $' + avgPerTask + '\n\n' + 'üìú EARNINGS HISTORY:\n' + (history.length > 0 ? history.map(entry => '‚Ä¢ ' + entry.time + ' - ' + entry.platform + ': $' + entry.amount.toFixed(2)).join('\n') : '‚Ä¢ No earnings recorded yet' ) + '\n\n' + '---\nGenerated by ADHD Gig Tracker üéØ'; // Copy to clipboard navigator.clipboard.writeText(textData).then(() => { showNotification('Data copied to clipboard! üìã Paste anywhere!', 'milestone'); }).catch(() => { // Fallback for older browsers const textArea = document.createElement('textarea'); textArea.value = textData; document.body.appendChild(textArea); textArea.select(); document.execCommand('copy'); document.body.removeChild(textArea); showNotification('Data copied to clipboard! üìã', 'milestone'); }); } // Initialize app function init() { updateUI(); showNotification('Welcome back! Ready to earn some money? üöÄ', 'milestone'); } // Start the app if (document.readyState === 'loading') { document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', init); } else { init(); } + remaining.toFixed(2) + ' to goal ‚Ä¢ Keep going! üí™'; } // Update undo button elements.undoBtn.disabled = history.length === 0; // Update history updateHistory(); } // Update history display function updateHistory() { if (history.length === 0) { elements.historyList.innerHTML = '
Start adding earnings to see your progress! üéØ
'; return; } elements.historyList.innerHTML = history.map(entry => '
' + '
' + '
' + entry.platform + '
' + '
' + entry.time + '
' + '
' + '
+$' + entry.amount.toFixed(2) + '
' + '
' ).join(''); } // Add earning function addEarning(amount, platform) { totalEarnings += amount; taskCount++; // Add to history const now = new Date(); history.unshift({ amount: amount, platform: platform, time: now.toLocaleTimeString(), timestamp: now }); // Keep only last 20 entries if (history.length > 20) { history = history.slice(0, 20); } // Check milestones checkMilestones(); // Update UI updateUI(); // Show success showNotification('+$' + amount.toFixed(2) + ' from ' + platform + '! üí∞'); } // Check for milestones function checkMilestones() { const milestones = [5, 10, 25, 50, 100]; const currentMilestone = milestones.find(m => totalEarnings >= m && totalEarnings - history[0].amount < m); if (currentMilestone) { setTimeout(() => { showNotification('üéâ $' + currentMilestone + ' milestone reached! üéâ', 'milestone'); }, 500); } // Goal reached if (totalEarnings >= dailyGoal && totalEarnings - history[0].amount < dailyGoal) { setTimeout(() => { showNotification('üèÜ DAILY GOAL SMASHED! You are incredible! üèÜ', 'milestone'); }, 1000); } } // Select platform function selectPlatform(platform, amounts) { currentPlatform = platform; // Update quick buttons elements.quickGrid.innerHTML = amounts.map(amount => '' ).join(''); showNotification(platform + ' selected! Tap amounts below üéØ', 'milestone'); // Reset after 30 seconds setTimeout(() => { elements.quickGrid.innerHTML = '' + '' + '' + ''; }, 30000); } // Manual amount validation elements.manualInput.addEventListener('input', function() { const value = parseFloat(this.value); elements.manualBtn.disabled = !value || value <= 0; }); elements.manualInput.addEventListener('keypress', function(e) { if (e.key === 'Enter' && !elements.manualBtn.disabled) { addManualAmount(); } }); // Add manual amount function addManualAmount() { const amount = parseFloat(elements.manualInput.value); if (amount && amount > 0) { addEarning(amount, currentPlatform || 'Manual Entry'); elements.manualInput.value = ''; elements.manualBtn.disabled = true; } } // Goal editing function editGoal() { elements.goalArea.classList.add('hidden'); elements.goalInput.classList.remove('hidden'); elements.goalInput.value = dailyGoal.toFixed(2); elements.goalInput.focus(); elements.goalInput.select(); } elements.goalInput.addEventListener('blur', saveGoal); elements.goalInput.addEventListener('keypress', function(e) { if (e.key === 'Enter') saveGoal(); }); function saveGoal() { const newGoal = parseFloat(elements.goalInput.value); if (newGoal && newGoal > 0) { dailyGoal = newGoal; updateUI(); showNotification('Goal updated to $' + dailyGoal.toFixed(2) + '! üéØ'); } elements.goalInput.classList.add('hidden'); elements.goalArea.classList.remove('hidden'); } // Undo last function undoLast() { if (history.length > 0) { const last = history.shift(); totalEarnings -= last.amount; taskCount = Math.max(0, taskCount - 1); updateUI(); showNotification('Undid $' + last.amount.toFixed(2) + ' from ' + last.platform, 'error'); } } // Clear history function clearHistory() { if (confirm('Clear all earnings for today? This cannot be undone.')) { history = []; updateUI(); showNotification('History cleared! üßπ'); } } // Reset all function resetAll() { if (confirm('Reset everything? This will clear all earnings and reset your goal.')) { totalEarnings = 0; taskCount = 0; history = []; dailyGoal = 50; currentPlatform = ''; updateUI(); showNotification('Everything reset! Fresh start! üåÖ', 'milestone'); } } // Export data function exportData() { const today = new Date().toLocaleDateString(); const avgPerTask = taskCount > 0 ? (totalEarnings / taskCount).toFixed(2) : '0.00'; const textData = 'üß† ADHD Gig Tracker Report - ' + today + '\n\n' + 'üí∞ SUMMARY:\n' + '‚Ä¢ Total Earned: $' + totalEarnings.toFixed(2) + '\n' + '‚Ä¢ Daily Goal: $' + dailyGoal.toFixed(2) + ' (' + Math.round((totalEarnings / dailyGoal) * 100) + '% complete)\n' + '‚Ä¢ Tasks Completed: ' + taskCount + '\n' + '‚Ä¢ Average per Task: $' + avgPerTask + '\n\n' + 'üìú EARNINGS HISTORY:\n' + (history.length > 0 ? history.map(entry => '‚Ä¢ ' + entry.time + ' - ' + entry.platform + ': $' + entry.amount.toFixed(2)).join('\n') : '‚Ä¢ No earnings recorded yet' ) + '\n\n' + '---\nGenerated by ADHD Gig Tracker üéØ'; // Copy to clipboard navigator.clipboard.writeText(textData).then(() => { showNotification('Data copied to clipboard! üìã Paste anywhere!', 'milestone'); }).catch(() => { // Fallback for older browsers const textArea = document.createElement('textarea'); textArea.value = textData; document.body.appendChild(textArea); textArea.select(); document.execCommand('copy'); document.body.removeChild(textArea); showNotification('Data copied to clipboard! üìã', 'milestone'); }); } // Initialize app function init() { updateUI(); showNotification('Welcome back! Ready to earn some money? üöÄ', 'milestone'); } // Start the app if (document.readyState === 'loading') { document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', init); } else { init(); } + amount.toFixed(2) + ' from ' + platform + '! üí∞'); } // Check for milestones function checkMilestones() { const milestones = [5, 10, 25, 50, 100]; const currentMilestone = milestones.find(m => totalEarnings >= m && totalEarnings - history[0].amount < m); if (currentMilestone) { setTimeout(() => { showNotification('üéâ $' + currentMilestone + ' milestone reached! üéâ', 'milestone'); }, 500); } // Goal reached if (totalEarnings >= dailyGoal && totalEarnings - history[0].amount < dailyGoal) { setTimeout(() => { showNotification('üèÜ DAILY GOAL SMASHED!
